name: Long Term — Short Term, Inc.
overview: Since 1998, Long Term - Short Term, Inc., has offered stock market tools and stock market education to assist investors in their efforts to successfully trade the financial markets. The company provides students with technology and education required to trade the stock market without the help of a stock broker. Long Term - Short Term has a proprietary market-leading course structure and mentoring support that allows students to learn at their own pace, while still being able to attain the necessary knowledge to become a start trading in the stock market. Long Term - Short Term, Inc. is the corporate entity that conducts business under the name of BetterTrades, a stock market education company.
